description.value: You're an incredible actor, and you can use your over-the-top bits and dramatic gestures to throw a foe off its game. If you're wielding a ranged weapon, you can @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.actions.Item.Feint] against an opponent at a range of 100 feet, rather than just within melee reach. If you succeed, the opponent is @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.conditions.Item.Off-Guard] against your melee and ranged attacks, rather than only your melee attacks.
